\beginhymn O salutaris Hostia.

\setgregorian1
\setclef14
\musicindent14mm
\raisesong3\Internote
\nosolesmescustos
\initiumgregorianum
\musicinitial{Hymn\\8.}{O}%
\sgn {}{}{}\punctum N\egn
\sgn sa-\pes Na\nonspatium\climacus cba\egn
\sgn lu-\clivis NM\egn
\sgn t{\'a}-\engl{\idx{O saving Victim}, op'ning wide}\clivis aN\egn
\sgn ris\torculus aba\egn
\spatium
\sgn H{\'o}s\punctum N\egn
\sgn ti-\punctum M\egn
\sgn {}a,\punctum N\augmentum N\egn
\spatium
\divisiominor
\spatium

\spatium
\sgn c{\ae}l\punctum b\egn
\sgn {}i{}\punctum c\egn
\spatium

\sgn dis\clivis cb\egn
\spatium
\sgn {}{\'o}{st}\clivis aN\egn
\sgn {}i-\punctum a\egn

\spatium

\spatium
